desc: Spend more time playing and less time cleaning. TotsAhoy! splash mats are a fun, colourful way for you and your children to enjoy all life's messy, little moments. DISCOVER OUR AWARD WINNING TEEPEES. Encourage imaginative play with our beautiful handcrafted Teepee play tents.

layout.text: With our award winning Canicove Teepees. Available in 4 different colours.
